sentences.sContent: It may be tempting for some to decry incentives as nothing but a poisonous fruit of Con-Lib responsibility thinking.
sentences.sContent_eng: It may be tempting for some to decry incentives as nothing but a poisonous fruit of Con-Lib responsibility thinking.
sentences.sCn: 对一些人谴责激励机制只是作为“新政治”责任思考的毒果这样的结论本身是很冒险的。

trans.tranOther: to state publicly that you do not approve of something
